About hdparm v9.30

hdparm home page:
  http://hdparm.sourceforge.net/  
The source to hdparm is hdparm-9.30.tar.gz (released 2010-09-19), downloaded on 2011-02-26 from Sourceforge.net
  http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/hdparm/hdparm/hdparm-9.30.tar.gz
Local copy:
  /data/archive/thirdparty/src/hdparm/hdparm-9.30.tar.gz

The license is BSD style, with no attribution needed.

Note: Latest version is hdparm-9.43.tar.gz (Released 2012-11-15)
